It tells ya just how many brain cells my dumb-ass crew has to rub between themselves, doesn't it?! That I've never found myself here until today!
Well...here she is at last. A strong, Sadalan Saiyan, in all her naked glory! Don't see that every day.
Shut up! I'm a god damn punk, cause I don't shave myself! (Ain't gonna tell them the time I was showing Kale some styling tips.)
Alright then, let's see what you've got, ~name~.
Hmm. You look like someone who needs to blow off some steam. Ain't no use trying to play coy with me, ~name~. It's written all over your face.
I ain't sensing a whole lotta energy coming from you, pal. Maybe you're hiding your real ability though, hmm?
Psh. You don't seem all that tough. (So why're my instincts telling me this is the guy I need to watch out for?)
I know when I've got a decent fight on my hands. And I'm sensing a fighter in you, ~name~.
(Whoever this guy is, he's taking this real seriously. Ain't gonna take him down without a fight.)
Hehe, y'know it's funny. If you'd asked me earlier, I would've guessed that Palutena here was the angel, not you.
Are you really sure that you're the angel here, Pit? It ain't Palutena? I'd find it easy to believe that she's related to Vados. You...not so much.
Huh. Here I'm just surprised to see a human with a full head of hair. Thought you were all a bunch of walking cue balls or something.
Man, that head of hair wouldn't be outta place on a Saiyan. I thought humans were bald. How about that.
Huh. You have hair. Some humans beings have hair apparently. Learn something new every day.
Hmm. You remind me a little of someone. You wouldn't happen to be Goku's half-human brother of something would ya?
You...kinda remind me of Goku a little. Or his son maybe. In looks at least.
Well hello there, big, tall and mysterious. Got any surprises in store for little old me?
You've been pretty quiet since ya got here. I ain't complaining about it, just stating a fact.
Hmm. You kinda remind me of someone. Ain't gonna tell ya who though.
Hey, I know a guy who's kinda like you. Got the same sorta vibe and energy as he does.
(This is where we find out if my hunch was right or not.)
(Come on, buddy. Pull that trick again. Let's see if I'm right about you.)
Oh, don't mind me, Skippy. I'm just waiting for something over here. None of ya business as to what that is.
(If I'm right about this, I'm only gonna need to see it one more time to know.)
Think you could skip to the best bit already?
Wait, if you're using time-skip for this. What does that make what'cha doing right now, a skip-tease?
So, you gonna time-skip again, or ya gonna mix things up this round?
Well go ahead, Skippy. Show us what ya got.
Come on then, Skippy. we doing this one more time then?
On with the skip-tease then? Haha.
Come on then, human Hit. Think you can do your time-skip again for me? Pretty please?
Cute wings. Kinda redundant though, wouldn't you agree? Anyone with half a brain can learn how to fly.
You remind me of the battle royal I was involved in. Talking about the flyers specifically. I don't remember them being all that strong, but they were annoying to deal with.
You just remind me a little of someone I know. (Heh, playing with a regular old Cabba over here.)
You certainly ain't like any angel I've met, that's for sure. Usually they're blue and tall. Then here you are, all pink and short and what have you.
Hey, the angel of the Tenth Universe looked cute and little like you now that I think about. Don't know her name, but she was definitely one of the prettiest angels I've seen.
Hmm. Y'know I've only seen a handful of angels in my time. Maybe they ain't all got blue faces and white hair like Vados and her bros and sisters.
You seem kinda plain-looking if ya ask me. But whatever, let's see what you've got.
Yeah well if looks were power levels, yours both go together pretty good.
Psh. Yeah, sure. Hope your body is more exciting to look at than ya face is.
Haha! How many is that now? Sucks to have your luck right now.
Yeah! Take that! That's a good one-two punch if I ever saw one!
Heh. Careful there ~name~, gonna be put through the ringer if ya don't get your act together fast.
Haha. Hey, you've gotta match the cards, remember? Colors, numbers, shapes. That sorta thing...
Hey, I thought you knew how to play this thing? Would've thought that'd be important before putting your dignity on the line.
Wow. Your luck is incredible right now. The bad kind of incredible that is.
Ha! Again?! It's like you're in a hurry to lose or something.
Haha, yeah, that kinda happens sometimes!
...Are you throwin' this thing? Find it hard to believe that you're actually this bad.
Sure taking you down a few pegs right now, huh?
Gettin' worse and worse for you right now!
You concussed or something? I don't need to worry, do I? What with the way you're taking all these losses.
Wow. Now you're just being stupid.
Hmph. Just my luck. Playing with some weirdo who's actually trying to lose. That, or you've got the luck of someone from Universe 9.
You like that, huh? Well that's just how Caulifla rolls.
Mistakes like that will cost ya. Your clothes mostly, heh heh.
Tough luck, buddy. But ya still gotta strip.
Think you've got what it takes to impress me? Go ahead and try at least.
Gotta warn ya. It takes a lot to impress me.
Maybe next time, friend.
Looks like I gotcha there, didn't I?
I'm just gonna keep quiet and enjoy the show.
You nervous or something? Well, I bet having to drop ya clothes in front of me would be pretty nerve-racking, haha.
Ha! Ya like that, huh?
Tag! Gotcha!
Ha! Ya like that? Got plenty more where that came from.
Can't afford to make silly mistakes in a game like this. In some ways the stakes are higher here than in a lot of fights.
Mistakes like that will cost ya. Now, strip!
I ain't standing here for the good of my health. Get to stripping!
I ain't floating here for the good of my health. Get to it!
Hehe, gotcha.

Jerking me around, thinking you're so tough. Gonna look mighty funny chewing meat of the bone with no god damned teeth.
Wow, thanks for reminding me how badly you trashed me this game.
Taking a loss this hard, totally sucks.
Not a lot to say about that.
Not a lot to say about that move right there.

Come on! Pick up the pace, you're killing me by ditching stuff like that.
Oh forget it. At this point you're just trying ta humiliate me.
You trying to be coy? It doesn't suit you.
Yeah seriously, if you're trying to be coy or something, it ain't making you look good.
Careful Kizuna, you might be making someone's day with that stance right there.
Yeah. And I'm sure your making a few new fans whilst you're doing that to.
Well so long as your fine with giving passersby an eyeful, more power to ya.

Don't sweat it. I'm a Saiyan, I could eat my own body weight in that stuff and not put on anything.
Well, I guess we've all learned something from Erufuda. Eating too much Earth food ain't good for your elf.
Aww, see, now you're just making me wanna eat it more!
I'm looking forward to finding out what Earth has to offer. I think visiting this planet was the right idea.
Wow. You really got busted up bad, huh.
Wait, that thing just pops right off? Doesn't that hurt or something?
Man. You human singers are weird as hell. Saiyan ones can't screw their heads off to my knowledge.
Hahaha! Okay, this is weird as crap I know. But come on, what else can I do besides laugh?
Hahahaa! I guess I gotta laugh about it, beats screaming about it and losing my head like some weakling. Hahahaa!
Haa! Man, I guess if Saiyan music was this much fun, I'd go to way more concerts than I do right now.
Nice catch I guess, wouldn't want your head rolling away. And ain't that a weird thing to say.
Hey, are those french fries or whatever? I passed a place that sold those on my way here. So I stole me some. They were alright, hardly worth screaming over though.
*sniff* *sniff* Those some kinda fried vegetables or something ya got there? I'm a Saiyan, you bet I can tell what kinda food I'm smelling.
*sniff* *sniff* Those smell...alright I guess. Smelt waaay better food than that before. But Earth's got some real good stuff from what I've heard.
Whatever kinda snacks you've got there, they smell kinda interesting. Been meaning to try out some Earth food whilst I'm here.
Just take it one strap and knot at a time. You'll have that armor off before ya know it.
It's gotta be just like learning a new combat drill. You're confident about that, right? Why would ya approach this any differently?
You gonna let some stupid armor show ya who's boss? I mean, look at me. Don't see me stammering about something like that.
See? Take it one stage at a time and you're gonna get through it. Might still win this thing for all I know.
Y'know it ain't impossible for ya to win this thing. I might be super tough, but I ain't unbeatable. You might cause an upset.
You're a fighter, ain't ya ~name~?, You ain't got nothing to worry about!
So, act or not, ya gonna launch any other personalities my way? How many ya got in that funny old noggin of yours?
Hmm. Maybe you ain't messing with me. That or you're the best actor since Frost hoodwinked the universe into thinking he was a swell guy.
Hmm. Maybe you're for real...nah. Soon as I start thinking that you're gonna "switch back" and be all like, haha, told ya so. I'm harder to fool than that I'm afraid.
Wait, those are shears you've got there!? Wow, you've actually surprised me with that move.
Wait. Shaving? Oooh! Right, I get it. You're gonna count that as a play.
Oh. And here I thought I had ya knocked out. Seems you ain't ready to quit just yet.
Interesting armor by the way. Looks kinda like the stuff I'm familiar with back home. You humans are more advanced than I thought.
Aww, how cute. Armor ain't no use to me anymore, Meia. Maybe one day you'll get on my level.
Armor ain't been no use to me for a long while. You'll get there one day with training, maybe. Enough so you won't have to worry about lasers at least.
Oh yeah, meaning to ask. What's with your uniform thing? That eye like a sensor or something? What's up with that?
That bloodshot eye on your shirt is looking at me real close, huh. What, does it like what it sees over here?
Hey, can you tell your shirt to stop giving me the stink-eye? I know I'm the baddest bitch here, but come on, there is a limit!
What's with all the snap, crackle and pops coming from over your way anyway? It's kinda annoying.
Well I suppose using attacks or something is one way to approach this. You doing that by the way? Or someone else?
Haha. Talk about being a little fire-cracker.
Wow. I knew something smelt off about ya. But this is on a whole 'nother level to what I was expecting.
Whoa. And here I thought you just didn't wash right or some crap. You're actually a dead girl walking.
Yeah. Definitely thinking that dragons and magic is behind this somehow.
Man. Whatever dragon wished you back to life? Sure had a twisted sense of humor.
And here I just thought you just hadn't washed in a while.
Hmm...you ain't a fighter I don't think. But I am getting a weird kinda vibe from ya. Don't try anything funny, lady.
Hey! I see you eying me up over there. You like what ya see or something, sweater girl?
...Alright, I know a perv when I see one. You look like you're thinking up some kinda fantasy over there. Better not involve me if you know what's good for ya.
...You've got a knowing sorta grin on your face. And I'm pretty sure that I don't like it. I'm watching you, Zone-tan.
Well, you don't seem particularly scary, pint-size. Actually...you seem kinda anxious right now. You okay over there?
Hey, you alright over there? ~name~, was it? You seem kinda nervous right now.
Hey, you sure you wanna play a game like this? You seem kinda nervous if ya ask me. I wouldn't have pegged you for being the adventurous type.
Say, strange sorta power you've got there. Not like any I've ever felt before. Still, power's power. Least you've got a lick of it, unlike most I've seen around here.
Hey, Raven was it? Pretty unique energy you've got. Feels kinda...I dunno, strange I guess? Mean nothing by that, just can't put my finger on ya is all I'm saying.
Curious sorta power you've got. Raven was it? Wouldn't mind seeing what you can do. I'm always interested in fighting new people!
Gotta admit, I've seen better plays. More gutsy ones too.
Y'know, I was thinking of dragging my friend Kale along to this...but I ain't sure she'd enjoy something like this.
You and I both know that you can do better. But that's fine for now at least.
Nervous? Don't be. Rock what ya got, don't let anyone put ya down.
Come on, lady. I arrived at this joint wearing less than that.
(Yeah, this game would probably be too much for Kale. But she has surprised me before...)
Hmm. Could Kale benefit from playing this sorta game? Wouldn't want her having a freak-out during it.
Not gonna see me dancing for joy or anything mind...but whatever, you do you.
Your ~clothing~? In your own time then.
Well, it has to come off. Better now than later at least.
The ~clothing~? Haha, very funny.
Pretty basic, but I can forgive ya this one time.
Well...considering you've still got that? Means you've got a little bit of fight in ya at least!
You're being kinda timid about all this y'know? It ain't a good attitude to have.
I'm betting she's gonna be completely dull and pick something like her ~clothing~.
Come on now, you've gotta show more spirit than that.
See you fumbling with your ~clothing~ there. Bet I can guess in one what you're gonna take off next.
You're gonna ditch the ~clothing~ and be boring, ain't cha?
Toss me a bone here? Wait, did I just say...ugh, don't read into that.
I'm painfully indecent. And you're painfully dull. But what else is new, right?
Victory sure feels like a long way away.
Can't say I'm feeling much anticipation about this move.
Which direction we going here, big or little? 'Scuse me if I ain't feeling optimistic.
So, big or little? I'd like the first option, but I feel like I ain't gonna get what I want here.
Can't you save that for some other time? You're killing me over here.
Hey I've been pretty nice to ya this game. Why you being a bitch to me like this?
Stop...gah! It's like you're trying to annoy everyone.
You're being a real piece of work here ~name~, choosing that of all things.
Not what I want to see. Or anyone else I'd imagine.
Hmm? Oh, that? Well, I don't care. But you might here some protest about it from the others.
The ~clothing~? Ah that ain't nothing.
You're hanging on in there, huh.
I know I'm no worse than you are at this. (Why ain't I where she is right now?)
That because of me, you ditching that? The trash-talk was just part of the game, I didn't mean any of it, alright?
Eh, I knew this was a stupid game.
Still got that? Sure know how to make me look stupid.
Yeah. Definitely something weird going on with ya. (Her energy feels real strange to. What's up with that?)
Alright, whatever. I guess this kinda game is gonna draw people with funny sorts of ideas. Just don't involve me in any of them, got it?
Well. I guess this kinda is gonna attract perverts. Guess that makes me a little dirty to if I thought this'd be fun. Ha! Oh well.
So...you ride about on some kinda flying animal when ya fight? That's kinda out there,but I've certainly seen weirder.
So, you know how to show some big, snorting beast of burden who's boss, right? Why ya fretting over what we're gonna think of ya?
Yeah. If ya gonna wear any kinda protection, gotta make sure it won't slow ya down. That's worse than having nothing at all.
Alright, let's move onto the next one. Things seem to be going okay so far.
Yeah, there we go. It ain't so hard really, is it.
Yeah. Just do something when all's said and done, ain't gotta be major flashy all the time. Something's usually better than nothing.
See? Ya had it in ya all along!
Hey, you're the one making a big deal outta your situation. Quit messing with us already.
Oh please. You're close to being a bigger drama queen than Lord Champa.
Well. Sorry 'bout that? Heh, is that what you wanted me to say right now? You want a kiss and a cuddle as well? Sorry, ain't getting me on board with this performance, lady.
Know what? Fair play. I probably wouldn't have thought of that if I was in your place.
Well ya won't catch me shaving myself to keep in the game. So fair enough, that's one gutsy move to make right there.
Don't like to admit it, but ya had me fooled there. I thought I'd beaten ya already.
Heh. So ya had some tricks to play after all. Seems like you've got half a brain in that head of yours at least.
And here I overheard some people saying that Sheep are dumb. You've proven them wrong right there!
Also what's with ya buddy stripping with ya? You strong-arm her into doing that? Haha, that's kinda funny.
Oh, and has anyone told ya friend that she don't have to do this with ya? What's with that?

Looks like your number one fan Mako is still at it. That's worth a laugh at least.
Wow check that out. You're making mine look prudish by comparison.
Hmm. Well, guess you don't really need the support anyway.
How about that. Pretty risque that little belt of yours.

Well now you know that you've got the whole package, girlie.
Well you're a human hologram girl, right? I'd guess that toes are to be expected.

Wouldn't impress a Saiyan, but they wouldn't laugh much either. Emphasis on much.
Well at least ya did it. I've met losers who wouldn't even go that far.
See, you're getting into the spirit of things! Slowly.
Having fun yet?
Saiyans like brave mates. A coward won't interest anyone.

Oh I don't care. It'll just make beating you all the sweeter in the end.
When you lose, it's going to be all the sweeter, loser.
Yeah gotta be honest, that's what I'd have gone for, if I had what you've got on right now. Emphasis on had, haha!

Just let me know when you're going to make a real play.

Ain't making much of a statement with that move.
What a tease.
Lame.
Mark my words, when I win, it's gonna be one, sweet victory when I do.
Well you've got guts, in a way. Ditching something that small when I'm like this.
*sigh* Yeah, I knew that'd be up next. Still not happy about in though.
Well, that's a boring choice.
Bet you're breaking a few balls with that move.
(What we thinking Caulifla. Crap, or super crap? Gonna go with ultra crap.)
That ain't gonna get anyone going. Except weirdos maybe.
Pretty humbling to see all the crap you've still got. Damn, I was not ready for today.
Wow. You ain't anywhere near your limit. Now now, and not when I was flung out the running.
Well, that one was a dud.
You really took me to school in this game. Didn't half give me a beating.
Y'know, losing like I have here. It never get's any less humiliating.
Seems that was a non-event.
Well, you're certainly playing at your own pace.
Oh joy, a whole load of nothing.
Man how did I do it? How did I screw up so badly?

Alright, I know you stuffed me, but no need to rub it in.

So what, we gonna use energy blasts or something? Or this actually gonna be a magic trick or the slight of hand variety?
So long as you ain't planning on saying Hakai or something, this should be pretty fun.

Heh. Never heard of a banana. But I think I got an idea what it looks like.

So then, what ya got for me this time?
Will it kill ya to ditch something? No? Then strip already!
This round's going in my favor.
Man, Kale would be red as a ruby right now. Don't get me wrong though, she's the best friend I could ever ask for.

Your ~clothing~ now? This oughta be good.
Heh. Looks like we're giving you the business here.

Oh now we're talking, finally.
Ah, the ~clothing~. Nice.
Took ya long enough! This is the kind of thing I came here for.
This round's going in my favor. Bringing you in line to where I'm at.
Just gonna stand back, keep my mouth mostly shut, and enjoy what I'm seeing.
Yeah that's about worth what I've lost. Ditch that ~clothing~ already!
Been waiting for this. Getting to see some progress!
Think you'll beat me? Yeah, as if!
Alright, not gonna complain this time at least. Complain plenty about being nude obviously, but that's a different thing.
Yeah, that's better. Better be taking off your ~clothing~.
Guess it ain't all bad news today.
Awesome, now take your ~clothing~ off already!
Alright then ~name~, show me what you got.
That took long enough. You really wanted to keep hold of that, didn't ya.
Give me something to smile about. This game's been pretty rough on me.
Something better this time? God, finally!
Feels like I've been waiting forever to get something half-decent.
Hurry it up already! Go!
We getting somewhere, finally? About damn time.
Go, ~name~! Go, ~name~! Go, ~name~! Come on, ~name~!
You ready? I'm sure ready.
Come on already, come on!
Alright, can't say I've lost complete interest.
Come on, come on! Let's keep this here party moving!
Something better? Yeah, alright, that is better.
Good, was wondering when you were gonna lose something.
You better not be trying to tease me still. Otherwise I got an energy blast with your name on it.
Yeah you made me look like an idiot, glad to be getting a little something from ya in return.
Oh, for me? How kind of ya.
You better be keeping this party goin'!
Err, buddy? Was kinda expecting nipples to be there, given how many similarities there are between Saiyans and humans.
Huh. Smooth as a royal sculpture. Someone put some real love into crafting you.
Wow. Someone put some real craftsmanship into making you.
Err, buddy? Was kinda expecting nipples to be there, given how many similarities there are between Saiyans and humans already.
No kidding, huh? Honestly I think ya got short-changed there, shorty. In addition to the other obvious way.
You sure ya don't want to take your game up a notch? Starting to look a little rocky for ya here, pal.
You're actually pretty easy on the eyes.
Yeah, yeah not bad, ~name~. Not bad at all.
You feeling the pressure? I'd hate to see you get knocked out before I get a proper challenge out of ya.
Yeah, that's what I'm talking about!
You lot better show ~name~ some appreciation!
Looks like the ultimate Saiyan strikes again. That's me if you haven't already guessed.
You the man! Showing everyone how it's done.
That makes you a little cooler. I mean, losing is still pretty lame. But that was actually something worth taking off at least.
Haha, I bet Cabba would be sweating up a storm right now. And this isn't even the worst bit for you yet!
You put most species out there to shame in the looks department, and you seem like a good example of yours. I'll give ya that much.
Y'know compared to most Saiyans, you don't look half bad. Take pride in that.
Okay! Yes! Now we're getting some place.
What ya pouting for? This game ain't over with yet. Keep your spirits up, you might just win this still. More unlikely things have happened before.
Face the facts ~name~, this could be the beginning of the end for ya.
Alright! I'm starting to get pretty pumped!
Careful now, few more slip-ups like that and you'll be out of this game quick as a flash.
Not too far apart now, are we. Think you'll be able to hold your nerve?
What's the matter? Let off the pressure thinking I was done? You'll have to fight harder if you wanna beat me!
Not bad. But I'm only gonna be satisfied when I beat ya.
You've got a decent move or two! But mine are better!
I ain't giving up just yet. Let's see if I can make a fight of this.
Huh, actually looking pretty good. I'm sure no one's gonna challenge me on that, like they'd have the spine to try.
Had a little something to offer after all, awesome.
Good enough, for the time being.
Expect to see something better next time though.
Alright, that's better ~name~. I'll take it.
Come on now ~name~, don't stop there, keep it coming.
You're looking better every round.
On a scale of one to ten, I'd give that a five. It's alright, and at this point I'll take it.
I bet that's knocked the wind outta ya!
Think you'll be able to get me going again? Well, keep losing stuff and I guess we'll see.
Heh, what can I say. I like what ya got.
Y'know, compliments where they're due, you look good.
Not a bad view. Got a little something out of ya, finally.
Knew you'd look better with out that blocking my view.
You look better without your ~clothing~. Keep it off I say.
It could still be better though. You know that, right?

Hmm. Gonna hazard a guess and say most of your training revolves around water. Sounds like a pretty interesting approach to combat.
Hey, so, what kinda techniques do they teach at your training school? Something to do with water I'm guessing?
Hey, you really a trainer of some kind? Find it hard to trust the word of someone without any real power to speak of.
You really a fight trainer, ~name~? You don't exactly look tough. I'd find it hard to trust a teacher who looks like they can't handle themselves.
You look more like a hanger-on than the brains behind any kind of operation. You really a gym leader of some kind?
See, the humans of my home universe blew themselves up in some kinda war. They only got resurrected recently. That's why I'm curious about where you came from.

state.text: So hey, just throwin' this out there, but you're a real cutie. I know a guy, Cabba. Picturing the pair of you together makes for a real cute image.

case.state: So, you're a princess right? If you're looking for a boyfriend or something, I know someone. Decent fighter, real sweet guy. Just food for thought.
Well, don't mind if I see this agai...pfft...pfft, hah-hahaha-haa!
Are you kidding me!? Hahahaa! This is amazing!
Mhmmhmm. Still as good ass eve...wait, did you just...
Yuuup. Still enjoying this as much as the last tim...wait. You just...ohh, this just got amazing for a whole other reason.
Hah! So, your "other half" is back now? Yeah, sure. Not as interesting as my two halves, that's for sure.
So, was that all fake or not? Heh, guess we'll never really know for sure.
Well, least it's the "fun half" that's back. Blue was a real bore, I'll take the blonde any day of the week.
Huh. You transforming up or down right now? Either way I'll be happy to see the costume go.
Hmm. Seems like you could stand to train some more, learn to keep your transformation on for longer.
You transforming? Heh, like that's gonna help ya...well, it might. Depends what kinds transformation it is really.
Oh great, this gonna be one of them lame-ass magical transformations? I thought you were cool, dammit!
Hmph. Ain't looking forward to this. Pleaaase be interesting, pretty please?
Huh. So it really is alive? Huh, how about that.
Wow, clothes that fly. What will they think of next?
You have some real weird fashion sense, ~name~.
Oh come on! I ain't gonna accept some stupid makeup as a wager! What are ya trying to pull here?
Makeup!? You serious? You're asking for a solid kick in the pants with that crap.
So, you're a princess right? If you're looking for a boyfriend or something, I know someone. Decent fighter, real sweet guy. Lemme know if you wanna arrange a date.
Wow. You're really throwing everything you have at this game. That's a real gutsy play right there!
Know what Emi? I got a lotta respect for ya, making a play like that. You've got an unshakable spirit and a drive to win. You're one heck of a person, ya know that?
Jeez, Emi. I can only imagine how vulnerable doing that would make me feel. I ain't pitying ya, don't take it that way. Just trying to think about how I'd feel in your place.
That's an awesome play right there. You've got the heart of a warrior Emi, ain't no doubting it.
Hmm...strange. I can't sense no energy from you for some reason. Means you're either a robot, or a hologram maybe? That'd be a first.
Hey Kizu girl, are you some kinda hologram or something? You look kinda computery, know what I mean?
Sooo...you're some kinda computer girl, right? That's clever, I guess. Hope you ain't cheating by downloading super strategies or something like that.
So you're a hologram, yeah? I'm guessing that if I punched ya that my fist would just pass right through, haha.
Now, see? Someone had to program that little pose of hers in. Tells you all about the person who made Kizuna here, doesn't it?
Still trying to figure out why someone would make a cute little thing like you. I mean, not really, but it's fun to pretend that the reason isn't obvious.
Telling ya this much, whoever was in charge of designing you sure pulled out all the stops.
That's just bad luck right there.
Your ~clothing~ next? Don't mind if you do.
So, losing your ~clothing~? This round's going in my favor.
This oughta be pretty good.
Well, ya know what ya gotta do. Gotta undress to impress in this game!
You've got it, they want it. You gonna let 'em have it?
Man. Talk about giving you the business.
Ouch! Bet you're feelin' that one.
Getting to see some progress. Think the others have been waiting for this, or just me?
Yeah that's about equal to what I've lost.
I'm sure that this is what everyone is here to see. To an extent.
I'm reeling you in. Slowly but surely.
Gonna try to keep my mouth shut. Wouldn't want to ruin this for everyone else.
Oh, getting to your ~clothing~ now are we? Good to see.
Good to see that you're starting to lose ground.
Aha haha! Yeah, that's the spirit!
Yeah, here we go. This is getting better now.
Going with the ~clothing~ finally? No complaints here.
Hitting me with some good news? Finally.
Well don't just stand there, you gonna strip or not?
Better be worth the effort it took to get that off.
Now that's more like it!
Yeah, not bad. That's something at least.
About time you took some damage.
Alright, I'm guessing it's your ~clothing~ next? That's better.
We've been waiting a while for this, haven't we now.
Go! Go! Go! I'm tired of waiting for something to happen.
Making progress? Even a little would be something.
Go, ~name~! Go, ~name~! Go, ~name~! Come on, ~name~!
When you're ready.
I ain't got forever over here. Come on, do it!
That's a bit more interesting.
Dropping ~clothing~ like a bad habit!
Yeah, don't care so much about a girl ditching stuff. Only thing that hurts is that you were so far ahead of me.
I'm sure no boys won't mind if you lose that.
You're starting to run out of options now.
Losing your ~clothing~ shouldn't be all that big of a deal.
That's an interesting look for ya, ~name~.
Well it's about time, ~name~. I was wondering if you were ever gonna lose that.
Let's keep this party goin'!
Don't get me wrong, whatever training you're doing is paying off for your body. Just doesn't seem to be doing much for your battle power.
I can tell that ya do some kinda excersise at least. Pretty nice-looking figure ya got there.
Well I guess it don't matter either way. This ain't a fight, only things that matter here is how well ya can play, and how good you look if ya can't!

condition.saying: I know how great my body is

case.state: Yeah. Be a crime not to admire a body like yours.

Yup. You're real adorable. I bet Cabba would be tongue-tied the second he catches sight of ya.

state.text: Just let me know if you're ever in the market for it, nature girl.

case.state: Hahaha-haa! Oh man, you are one hell of a treat! I can't believe that happened just now!
Hey, maybe your big old boobs can spring through your shirt next round. Is that your follow up material here? Ha haa!
Oh man. You are something special. I'm so glad I was here to see this.
Man I am loving this right now! This is the best damn strip poker I've ever played, no exceptions.
Man, you're really committed to this little act of yours. Or maybe you're just that scatter-brained, not remembering where your little toy weapon is.
*sigh* Have ya checked ya head? No really, you've got enough hair up top to hide away something that size.
Same place your little gag routine is going. Right down the drain.
Nicely done. Wouldn't want no accidents after all, now would we.
Hmm. You've got a knack for that. Done in under a minute and not a single scratch to be seen.

That's a way better look than that polka dot stuff you had on before. I don't see how anyone could take themselves seriously wearing something like that.
